recommendations.title: Migrate to AWS Free Tier for Development and Testing
recommendations.description: Utilize AWS Free Tier for development and testing environments to reduce costs.

recommendations.title: Downgrade EC2 Instance Type
recommendations.description: Downgrade EC2 instance type to a smaller instance type to reduce costs.

recommendations.description: Migrate to AWS RDS for PostgreSQL to reduce costs and improve performance.

recommendations.title: Use Open-Source Database Alternatives

recommendations.title: Use Open-Source Storage Alternatives
recommendations.description: Consider using open-source storage alternatives such as Ceph or Gluster to reduce costs.

recommendations.description: Implement cloud cost monitoring and optimization tools to identify areas of cost savings.

recommendations.description: Right-size EC2 instances to ensure they are running at optimal capacity.

recommendations.description: Use AWS Lambda for serverless computing to reduce costs and improve performance.
